ShortDescription: Howard Hermes Consulting is a Global Organizational Consulting Firm for Organizational and Business Development in Indonesia.
enhanced_description: PT. Howard Hermes Indonesia is a global organizational consulting firm based in Jakarta, specializing in organizational and business development. The firm partners with clients to build sustainable competitive advantage by driving performance and implementing measurable changes. Their approach focuses on maximizing an organization's human, customer, operational, and financial assets to achieve defined missions and become a leading company. They are dedicated to accelerating transformation, helping clients evolve into agile organizations, and addressing key business objectives such as fostering a diverse and inclusive workforce and enhancing skill development and learning efficiency.

Assisting organizations in building more diverse and inclusive workforces
Optimizing skill development processes and improving learning efficiency
Facilitating organizational transformation to achieve agile structures
Maximizing organizational assets (human, customer, operational, financial) to drive business success
Enhancing overall organizational performance to achieve sustainable competitive advantage
